remarks: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number by a number of positions which is not divisible by the prime number results in the word itself, the word is a "repeated symbol word".  (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 10-Nov-2018.)
statement: cshwsidrepsw $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ ( # ` W ) e. Prime ) -> ( ( L e. ZZ /\ ( L mod ( # ` W ) ) =/= 0 /\ ( W cyclShift L ) = W ) -> W = ( ( W ` 0 ) repeatS ( # ` W ) ) ) ) $.
